original_text: Withdraw thy foot from thy neighbour's house; lest he be weary of thee, and so hate thee.
korean_text: 너는 이웃집에 자주 다니지 말라 그가 너를 싫어하며 미워할까 두려우니라

sentences.original_text: Withdraw thy foot from thy neighbour's house
lest he be weary of thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너로 인하여 피곤하게 될까 두려워함이라
